official_title: Resolved the following-named Members be, elected to the standing committee of the House of Representatives on Ways and Means, Otis G. Pike, of New York, and Richard F. Vander Veen, of Michigan.

summary.text: Provides for the election of Otis G. Pike and Richard T. Vander Veen to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

titles.title: Resolved the following-named Members be, elected to the standing committee of the House of Representatives on Ways and Means, Otis G. Pike, of New York, and Richard F. Vander Veen, of Michigan.
